description: The generous, colourful and carefully prepared dishes served at this Italian bistro just a stone’s throw from St Mark’s Square could be described as “lagoon fusion” cuisine, thanks to one of the two chefs who demonstrates his love of Japanese flavours in some of his creative recipes.
